text: Muminagana yena muminagana chara kapheraderake bandhurupe grahana na kare. Ara ye ke'u erupa karabe tara sathe allah‌ra kono samparka thakabe na; tabe byatikrama, yadi tomara tadera nikata theke atmaraksara jan'ya satarkata abalambana kara [1]. Ara allah‌ tamra nijera sambandhe tomaderake sabadhana karechena [2] ebam allah‌ra dike'i pratyabartana
